definition: acting through or dependent on an intervening agency, act between parties with a view to reconciling differences
details:
adjective
- acting through or dependent on an intervening agency
= example: acting through or dependent on an intervening agency
- being neither at the beginning nor at the end in a series
= synonyms: middle, in-between
verb
- act between parties with a view to reconciling differences
= synonyms: intermediate, intercede, liaise, arbitrate
- occupy an intermediate or middle position or form a connecting link or stage between two others
= example: occupy an intermediate or middle position or form a connecting link or stage between two others
